code: import{makeStyles}from'@material-ui/core/styles';var useStyles=makeStyles(function(theme){return{box:{marginBottom:'20vh',overflow:'hidden'},h2:{color:'green',letterSpacing:'.4rem',textAlign:'center'},firstgrid:{marginBottom:'10vh'},lastgrid:{marginTop:'10vh'},btn:{color:'green',border:'1px solid green',background:'white',transition:'all 0.3s ease-in-out',fontSize:'1rem','&:hover':{color:'white',border:'1px solid white',background:'green',transition:'all 0.3s ease-in-out'}}};});export default useStyles;
